scripts.sassdoc: ./node_modules/.bin/sassdoc index.scss sassdoc --config=.sassdocrc && echo 'Documentation successfully generated in sassdoc/index.html'
scripts.sassdoc-deploy-first-time: git add sassdoc && git commit -m 'Compile SassDoc' --allow-empty && git subtree push --prefix sassdoc origin gh-pages && echo 'Documentation successfully deployed to http://Vertexo.github.io/sass-library-boilerplate/'
scripts.sassdoc-deploy: git add sassdoc && git commit -m 'Compile SassDoc' --allow-empty && git push origin :gh-pages && git subtree push --prefix sassdoc origin gh-pages && echo 'Documentation successfully deployed to http://Vertexo.github.io/sass-library-boilerplate/'
